column2: The recent war against Austria - or what was left of its former glory - has been victorious. Now all the people of this 'Remnant Empire' disintegrate into various nations and states, a pity... Nonetheless, Austria has fallen!

column1: The recent war against Germany has meant utter defeat for Austria. Now all the people of the 'Remnant Empire' disintegrate into various nations and states, a pity.
column2: The recent war against Germany has meant utter defeat for Austria. Now all the people of the 'Remnant Empire' disintegrate into various nations and states, a pity.

column2: The recent war against Habsburgs has meant utter defeat for Germany. Now that the National Assembly government, with its ill advised leaders, has fallen, it is Austria's turn to write the history of Greater Germany!

column2: The recent war against Radicals has meant utter defeat for Germany. Now that the German Confederation with its ill advised leaders has fallen that nation shall be wiped from the face of the Earth!

column1: The recent war has meant defeat for 'Greater' Germany. Now the independence of Austria shall be restored again.
column2: The recent war has meant defeat for 'Greater' Germany. Now the independence of Austria shall be restored again.

column1: The recent war has meant defeat for 'Greater' Germany. The secession of Austria has been forced upon the nation.
column2: The recent war has meant defeat for 'Greater' Germany. The secession of Austria has been forced upon the nation.

column1: The recent war has meant utter defeat for 'Mother Russia'. What Napoleon and his armies once began Germany shall now finish. Let our revolution of the people spread to all of Eastern Europe as well!
column2: The recent war has meant utter defeat for 'Mother Russia'. What Napoleon and his armies once began Germany shall now finish. Let our revolution of the people spread to all of Eastern Europe as well!

column1: The recent war has meant utter defeat for France. Leaving Germany as the true protector of Western Europe the oppressed people under French rule shall now create their own nations and states. Spread the Revolution!
column2: The recent war has meant utter defeat for France. Leaving Germany as the true protector of Western Europe the oppressed people under French rule shall now create their own nations and states. Spread the Revolution!

column1: The recent war has meant utter defeat for France. What Robespierre once began Germany shall now finish. Let our revolution of the people spread to all of Western Europe as well!
column2: The recent war has meant utter defeat for France. What Robespierre once began Germany shall now finish. Let our revolution of the people spread to all of Western Europe as well!

column2: The recent war has meant utter defeat for Germany. Now all the people of the 'German Nation' disintegrate into various nations and states... as always.

column2: Your highness, the German National Assembly has finally voted for a unified German nation. Her representatives are proposing that you shall become 'Kaiser der Deutschen', the head of state of Germany. How shall we respond?
